alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Windsor; Grand Isle; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 3:12AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Northern St. Lawrence and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. In Vermont, Eastern Windsor County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of heavy wet snowfall is expected this afternoon and evening across eastern Vermont. This snow may cling to trees and power lines and increase the likelihood of power outages.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Windsor; Grand Isle; Orange; Washington; Western Windsor
